talk_02:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>That is excellent news. <sp:5:1:0>The cold can be
fatal for the unprepared.
talk_07:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>That is a relief. <sp:5:1:0>Take care to keep yourself
warm as you climb the mountain.
talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The primary safeguards used by our
creators were <clr:0000>meals that warmed them<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>These meals were typically prepared using
ingredients with <clr:0000>warm-sounding<clr:ffff> names.<sp:5:0:0>
Any such ingredients will suffice.<sp:0:4:0>Some also wore thick clothes or warmed
themselves by a fire. <sp:5:0:0>These solutions were
effective but less accessible.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700>Be mindful of your ingredients when
cooking. <sp:5:0:0>My understanding is that only
one cooking effect can apply per meal.<sp:0:4:0>You must take care not to eat something
with a different effect afterward. <sp:5:0:0>The chill
will set in again sooner than you expect.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:QuestionNormal>Are you <clr:0000>fortified against the cold <clr:ffff>of this
snowy mountain?
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_00>Excuse me. <sp:5:0:0>The snowy mountain above us
is extremely cold.<sp:0:4:0>Unprepared travelers will <clr:0000>swiftly lose
vitality<clr:ffff> and may even die. <sp:5:1:0>Are you <clr:0000>fortified
against the cold<clr:ffff>?
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Think>Insufficient preparation can lead to death
in harsh environments. <sp:0:4:0>My advice can avert this. Please
listen carefully.
